p: Hammitt, Laura L, Sidi Kazungu, Steve Welch, Anne Bett, Clayton O Onyango, Rory N Gunson, J Anthony G Scott, and D James Nokes. 2011. “Added Value of an Oropharyngeal Swab in Detection of Viruses in Children Hospitalized with Lower Respiratory Tract Infection.” Journal of Clinical Microbiology 49 (6): 2318–20. https://doi.org/10.1128/JCM.02605-10.
